mapper.select: SELECT oid, op.pcode, pname, dept1no, dept2no, iloc, bname, odate, pprice FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.mid, m.oid, pcode, odate FROM (SELECT * FROM orderlist WHERE mid=#{mid}) m JOIN orderitem o ON m.oid= o.orderlist_oid) p WHERE (oid, pcode) NOT IN (SELECT oid, pcode FROM review WHERE mid=#{mid})) op LEFT JOIN prodDetail_view p ON op.pcode=p.pcode ORDER BY odate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(rno, mid, rdate, rrate, rcontent, pcode, oid, rtitle) VALUES (review_seq.NEXTVAL, #{mid}, SYSDATE, #{rrate}, #{rcontent}, #{pcode} , #{oid}, #{rtitle})
